protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-23573
text: Seeds were sterilized by vigorously shaking in 800 uL of 20% bleach (7:3) for 5 minutes and rinsed 5X in sterilized water. Seeds were sown on 0.5X MS 0.8% agar media plates and stratified for 4 days at 4C. After four days, the plates were transferred to room temperature under constant light. After 11 days, seedlings were transferred to a 0.5X MS 0.8% agar media plate containing either 10 uM cycloheximide or 10 uM cycloheximide and 1 uM ABA for 6 hours. After 6 hours, seedlings grown in both conditions were harvested from which RNA was extracted.
(Parameters: time unit = seconds, temperature unit = C, media = 1/2 X MS)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-23574
protocol.text: After 11 days of growth at room temperature and constant light, seedlings were transferred to a 0.5X MS 0.8% agar media plate containing either 10 uM cycloheximide or 10 uM cycloheximide and 1 uM ABA for 6 hours.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-23575
text: Eleven-day old seedlings were ground in liquid nitrogen. Total RNA was extracted by a Trizol-based method.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-23576
protocol.text: The top 2% and bottom 2% of signal intensities are excluded, then the mean is calculated. The original signal values  are scaled such that the mean (TGT value) is made equal to 500
